channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 157 Best Cyber Week Deals—Save up to 57% Off Gear We Love
item.description: Cyber Monday is over, but many deals are still available, at least for now. These are the absolute best discounts on gear we've tested ourselves.

item.title: Amazon Has New Frontier AI Models—and a Way for Customers to Build Their Own
item.description: Nova Forge lets Amazon’s customers train frontier models for different tasks—a potential breakthrough in making AI actually useful for businesses.

item.title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Players with a Netflix subscription can now download the game, which features mobile-friendly controls, including touch-screen shooting and navigation...

item.title: The spectacle of Bryan Johnson and his livestreamed shrooms trip
item.description: Bryan Johnson livestreamed his shrooms trip -- which included both Grimes and Marc Benioff -- as part of his controversial longevity research.

item.title: Android 16 adds AI notification summaries, new customization options, and more
item.description: The rollout of the new Android 16 features, which are first coming to Pixel devices, marks a new chapter in how Android updates work, as the company i...

item.title: ChatGPT referrals to retailers’ apps increased 28% year-over-year, says report
item.description: ChatGPT referrals to retailers' apps were up on Black Friday year-over-year, with Walmart and Amazon benefiting the most.

item.title: AWS CEO Matt Garman Wants to Reassert Amazon’s Cloud Dominance in the AI Era
item.description: As Google and Microsoft continue to surge, the AWS chief lays out his pitch: cheaper, reliable AI delivered at hyperscale.

item.title: Your Data Might Determine How Much You Pay for Eggs
item.description: A newly enacted New York law requires retailers to say whether your data influences the price of basic goods like a dozen eggs or toilet paper, but no...

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Disney+, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: The Beatles Anthology, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, and Fire and Water: Making The Avatar Films are just a few of the shows you should be watching...

item.title: AWS launches new Nova AI models and a service that gives customers more control
item.description: Amazon Web Services announced four new AI models within its Nova model family and a frontier model service.
